message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I think I can come up to $105 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest. I can come down to $110. It's still a great deal for you, and it's closer to my desired price. Let's make this happen!
